akn:content.akn:p:
§ 60o. Transferred Editorial Notes Codification Section 60o was editorially reclassified as section 4537 of this title.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Lump Sum Payment for Accrued Annual Leave of Senate EmployeesPub. L. 106–554, § 1(a)(2) [title I, § 6], Dec. 21, 2000, 114 Stat. 2763, 2763A–97, which related to lump sum payment for accrued annual leave of Senate employees, was editorially reclassified as section 4580 of this title.
